content.solution: Use Excel to open this file and see if it has a sheet called 'InfoSheet'. If not, create such sheet.

content.detail: Missing Study_ID property in InfoSheet.
content.solution: Include a valid Study_ID property into InfoSheet.

content.detail: Study_ID property <%s> in InfoSheet is invalid.
content.solution: Study_ID property in InfoSheet is not of a valid study. Replace the property with a valid study id.

content.detail: Invalid/missing Version property in InfoSheet.
content.solution: Correct/include a valid Version property into InfoSheet.

content.detail: Missing Filenames Sheet.
content.solution: Include a 'Filenames' sheet into the DOI file.

content.detail: Error processing DOI Generator.
Failed to retrieve DA <%s>
content.solution: DA file was not ingested prior the execution of this DOI file.

content.detail: Unsupported file name prefix, only accept prefixes DA-, DOI-, DPL-, STR-, SDD-, SSD-, STD-
content.solution: Rename the current file to have a valid prefix. Please note that the prefixes end with an hyphen, not an underscore

content.detail: Already processed a file with the same name %s .
content.solution: Either remove this file or the old file before moving forward.

content.detail: Unknown file format: %s
